meanings.sent1: The admissive gate welcomed visitors with open arms.
meanings.sent2: The museum had an admissive policy for all guests.
meanings.sent3: The admissive door seemed to smile at everyone who entered.
meanings.sent4: Her admissive attitude towards new ideas was like a warm embrace.
meanings.sent5: The admissive nature of the forest made it inviting to all.

meanings.definition: Capable of being admitted or accepted.
meanings.sent1: His admissive behavior made it easy for others to trust him.
meanings.sent2: The proposal was admissive of different viewpoints.
meanings.sent3: The admissive puzzle accepted all the pieces without complaint.
meanings.sent4: Her admissive personality was like a key that fit into any lock.
meanings.sent5: The admissive atmosphere of the party made everyone feel included.
